hollingworth-lake-contest
None
Hollingworth Lake, Rochdale 2nd prize £22 1s, 4th prize £10 18s Prizes: £20 and 11 guinea timepiece, 10 guineas + 11 guinea baritone, £7 10s and £9 flugel, £2 10s and 8 guinea soprano cornet, £2, £1
Euphonium solo contest won by Nelson Band (prize 15 guinea euphonium). 4th annual contest
